channel.title: Cody Kim on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.
channel.description: Recent content in Cody Kim on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.

item.title: From Demo to Success: Pitfalls of Modern Meetings (2/5)
item.description: Throughout this blog series, follow Seasalt.ai’s journey to creating a well rounded Modern Meetings Experience, starting with its humble beginnings, to optimizing our service on different hardware and models, to integrating state-of-the-art NLP systems and finally ending on the full realization of SeaMeet, our collaborative modern meeting solutions.

item.title: From Demo to Success: Implementing Microsoft's Modern Meetings and Beyond (1/5)
item.description: Throughout this blog series, follow Seasalt.ai’s journey to creating a well rounded Modern Meetings Experience, starting with its humble beginnings, to optimizing our service on different hardware and models, to integrating state-of-the-art NLP systems and finally ending on the full realization of SeaMeet, our collaborative modern meeting solutions.
